Plot: The life story of Jesus is told from his humble birth through his teachings, crucifixion and ultimate resurrection.
Title: Son of God
Writer: Richard Bedser, Christopher Spencer, Colin Swash, Nic Young
Actors: Sebastian Knapp, Paul Knops, Darcie Lincoln, David Rintoul
tomatoConsensus: The faithful may find their spirits raised, but on purely cinematic terms, Son of God is too dull and heavy-handed to spark much fervor.
